caption: Relating to the availability and use of airway clearance devices at public school campuses.
summary: This bill requires Texas public schools to have airway clearance devices available on campus, particularly where students consume food. Schools must ensure trained staff are present when students gather. The bill applies to all students including Chinese students, but does not specifically target any ethnic group. Schools can obtain devices through donations or allocated funds.
translation: 该法案要求德克萨斯州公立学校在校园内配备气道清理设备，特别是在学生就餐的地方。学校必须确保在学生聚集时有经过培训的工作人员在场。该法案适用于包括中国学生在内的所有学生，但并不针对任何特定族裔。学校可以通过捐赠或专项资金获得这些设备。
